titles.title: Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1994
A bill to establish the Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3981-3982)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of Agriculture, Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-775.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 3/25/1994--Introduced. Lower East Side Tenement Museum National Historic Site Act of 1994 - Designates the Lower East Side Tenement Museum at 97 Orchard Street, New York, New York, as a National Historic Site. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Site with donated or appropriated funds, to enter into cooperative agreements with the Museum designed to assure preservation and interpretation of the Site, and to acquire properties owned, operated, or required by the Museum. Authorizes appropriations.
